name: Memory Leak (BTG 2021 Winter Jam)
description:
Our submission to Behind the Game's Winter 2021 game jam. The theme was Memory Leak. We decided to make a platformer with the theme being incorporated into an obstacle.

Throughout the levels you come across memory water (the leak). The memory water causes things it touches to move backwards in time (to a previously remembered state).

We've made a few levels to play through. They're a bit basic so we may come back to the game and make some more complex levels in the future.

Team:

Jesse Lloyd-Dominik - Design, Programming, Sprites, Shaders

Stewart Grant - Programming, Level Design

Giga - Tile

Russel Hodges - Music

Credits:

Character Sprites adapted with minor modifications from Clint Bellanger's Platformer Animations under CC3.0

Controls:

[WASD] - Movement

[Space] - Jump (twice)

[R] - Reset Level
